title: Gap and Disney’s New ‘Nightmare Before Christmas’ Collection Puts a Jack Skellington Twist On Spooky Season Style
summary: A 23-piece collection features clothing, sleepwear and accessories inspired by Tim Burton's hit stop-motion animated film.

title: How Giorgio Armani Conquered Hollywood — And Changed the Red Carpet Forever
summary: Call it the 'American Gigolo' effect: Beginning in the '80s, the late Italian couturier's elegantly swaggering designs were inescapable, from the agency boardrooms to the Oscars stage.

title: Las Vegas travel is slumping. What does it mean for the rest of the U.S.?
summary: Las Vegas has seen visitation decline for seven consecutive months, with the most recent report from July showing a 12% decline year over year.
